statements: SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_date, customer_id, amount FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING average_amount < 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, customer_id, total_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM sales_transactions ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_date, document_type FROM generated_documents WHERE document_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, total_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, customer_id, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity >= 10 AND total_amount <= 500;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;

SELECT sales.transaction_id, sales.transaction_date, sales.customer_id, generated_documents.document_id, generated_documents.document_type FROM sales_transactions AS sales INNER JOIN generated_documents ON sales.transaction_id = generated_documents.related_transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM quotes ORDER BY quote_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, quote_id, products[1] FROM quotes WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT receipt_id, amount_paid FROM receipts WHERE amount_paid < 500 ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM quotes WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY quote_date DESC;
SELECT receipt_id, amount_paid FROM receipts WHERE payment_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY amount_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, total_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, transaction_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM quotes WHERE quoted_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(quoted_amount) AS total_quoted_amount FROM quotes;
SELECT transaction_date, product_id, quantity FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM quotes WHERE quoted_amount > 500);
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.quantity, receipts.paid_amount FROM transactions JOIN receipts ON transactions.transaction_id = receipts.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM Invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE status = 'Paid';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM SalesTransactions ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT quote_id, quote_date, total_amount FROM Quotes WHERE quote_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GeneratedDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Invoice' OR document_type = 'Receipt';
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE status = 'Paid' ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS invoice_count FROM Invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Quotes WHERE quote_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT document_id, document_date, document_content FROM GeneratedDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Report' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
